response.original_title: The World of Little Bear: Seasons
response.overview: It's Spring, and Little Bear's woods are alive with excitement. It's not just the weather. Emily is moving to the woods to live and Little Bear can hardly wait. But first, a house must be built for Emily, her grandmother, and her grandmother's little dog Tutu. All of the Little Bear's other friends are happy that Emily has come to stay. Duck, Cat, Owl and Hen are determined to have enough adventures and fun to last the whole year through.
response.title: The World of Little Bear: Seasons
